title: Bug 2940: Export Zip - Updating of checkboxes should use busy cursor
description: When updating the checked state of the table in the Export Zip feature, it takes a long time (30 seconds in my case) for the update to complete. The expected behavior is for a busy cursor to be shown during this process.
OB: The checked state of the table takes a long time (30 seconds in my case) to update.
EB: A busy cursor should be shown while the checked state of the table is being updated.
SR:
1. Open the Export Zip feature.
2. Check any checkbox in the table.
3. Observe the update process to see that it takes a long time (30 seconds in my case) and no busy cursor is shown.
